CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sales Team relative to Management Team?
SRP.A: Sales Team is {below} Management Team in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Management Team relative to Research & Development?
SRP.A: Management Team is {above} Research & Development in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Administrative Support relative to Management Team?
SRP.A: Administrative Support is {below} Management Team in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total absenteeism rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Research & Development}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total absenteeism rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Management Team}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Engineering Department's maximum Absenteeism Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Engineering Department's maximum Absenteeism Rate is in {1983}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Sales Team's minimum Absenteeism Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Sales Team's minimum Absenteeism Rate is in {1989}.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1995, did the total Absenteeism Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1987 and 1991?
NC.A: The change in total absenteeism rate between 1985 and 1995 was {larger} than between 1987 and 1991.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1995, was the average total Absenteeism Rate higher or lower than between 1995 and 2000?
NC.A: The average total absenteeism rate between 1991 and 1995 was {higher} than between 1995 and 2000.

NC.Q: Was the total Absenteeism Rate in 1997 higher or lower than in 2000?
NC.A: The total absenteeism rate in 1997 was {lower} than in 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1998, did the total Absenteeism Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 1987?
NC.A: The change in total absenteeism rate between 1991 and 1998 was {larger} than between 1985 and 1987.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Sales Team} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Management Team and Sales Team first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Management Team and Sales Team first exchanged leading positions in {1985}.
